about.description: Full stack software engineer with Front end experience in React, Angular, Typescript and Backend technologies such as NodeJS, Laravel, GraphQL. Experienced with SQL and noSQL databases. Proficient in 2 languages, Spanish and English, with bachelor’s in computer technology and system engineer.

projects.description: I was part of several teams designed to make software tailored to the client's requirements and needs.
tasks: Implemented AWS lambda function by AWS CDK using Python and Node.js.
Created different applications by using React.js and Redux.
Created a Google extension to gather information from user's gmail mails, using React.js and redux.

projects.description: Created an Angular app and Symphony framework to facilitate and improve the operation of financial entities.

projects.description: I worked on two different modules to improve internal processes of the university, allowing the administrative part to operate student information easily.
